t:
“Monsters aren't real, darling.
                    They won't hurt you.”



“Now come to me under the bed,” it continued in her mother's voice.
c:
“I won't hurt you. I just wanna play.”
Will you play with me?



#monster #under #bed #hiding #lie #impersonation #mother #call





Lately, I've been writing all these monster stories, I've stopped with the reality inspired ones. Guess, I need some new sadness in life.
